column1: **I set my alarm for 5 AM every day to train for the marathon.**
**She always dreamed of becoming a lawyer and studied hard to pass the bar exam.**
**Jake never seemed interested in taking on new projects at work.**
**They built a business from the ground up, starting with just a single product.**
**You often speak of writing a novel, yet your manuscript remains untouched.**
**Despite many setbacks, he kept applying to medical schools until he was accepted.**
**Her goal to climb Mount Everest seemed impossible until she finally reached the summit.**
**Tom always preferred to stay in his comfort zone, avoiding any tasks that required extra effort.**
**You continuously seek new challenges and never settle for mediocrity.**
**Their band played in small clubs for years before landing a major record deal.**
**I chose to learn a new language just to read my favorite novels in their original form.**
**She ran for local office and won, eager to make a difference in her community.**
**Despite his talent, he was content with playing video games all day instead of pursuing a career.**
**You put in extra hours at the gym because you want to become a professional athlete.**
**She wants to revolutionize the tech industry with her innovative startup idea.**
**He barely completed his assignments and showed no interest in advancing his career.**
**By launching a successful nonprofit, they aimed to solve environmental issues in their region.**
**The student always stayed after class to ask more questions, eager to learn everything they could.**
**Your tendency to procrastinate on important tasks shows a lack of ambition.**

**The artist devoted every spare moment to painting, hoping one day to exhibit in a gallery.**These examples illustrate various levels of ambition, in different contexts, from different perspectives, and with varied goals.
